Class DomUtil

public final class DomUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Static utility methods for manipulating an XML dom.

writeXMLFile

public static void writeXMLFile(java.lang.String destinationFileName,
                                org.w3c.dom.Document document,
                                java.lang.String schema)
Write out the xml document to a file.

Parameters:
destinationFileName - file to write xml to
document - xml document to write.
schema - of the schema to use if any (e.g. script.dtd of games.xsd). May be null.
